snippet.title: Generation Ship Trailer
snippet.description:
You're the AI, responsible for a generation ship, mankind's last hope for survival. Build efficient raw material cycles and help your crew to survive a long journey in a realistic real-time simulation and find a new home for the human race.

Wishlist NOW
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1638030/Generationship?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=Trailer

For more Updates and Screenshots, please join us 
on Discord: https://scifanstudios.com/discord
